00020 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 #ifndef TRANSITIONMATRIX_H_
00022 #define TRANSITIONMATRIX_H_
00023 
00024 #include <valarray>
00025 
00026 class TransitionMatrix {
00027 public:
00028 
00029 TransitionMatrix(const unsigned int N, const double val) : _size(N)
00030     {
00031     double off_diag = (1.0 - val)/(_size - 1);
00032     data.resize(_size*_size,off_diag);
00033     for (unsigned int j=0; j<_size; j++) {
00034         data[j*_size + j] = val;
00035         }
00036     }
00037 
00038 
00039 TransitionMatrix(const TransitionMatrix & T)
00040     {
00041     _size = T._size;
00042     data.resize(T.data.size());
00043     data = T.data;
00044     }
00045 
00046 
00047 TransitionMatrix & operator=(const TransitionMatrix & T)
00048     {
00049     if (this == &T) return *this;
00050 
00051     _size = T._size;
00052     data.resize(T.data.size());
00053     data = T.data;
00054     return *this;
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058 double operator()(const unsigned int k1, const unsigned int k2) const;
00059 double operator()(const unsigned int k) const;
00060 unsigned long size() const { return _size; }
00061 
00062 private:
00063 std::valarray<double> data;
00064 unsigned long _size;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 inline double TransitionMatrix::
00069     operator()(const unsigned int k1, const unsigned int k2) const
00070     {
00071     return data[k1*_size + k2];
00072     }
00073 
00074 inline double TransitionMatrix::operator()(const unsigned int k) const
00075     {
00076     return data[k*_size + k];
00077     }
00078 
00079 #endif // TRANSITIONMATRIX_H_
